item.title: WMT
item.description: score:-23 Chances: Ulta Beauty (ULTA) and Walmart (WMT) were among Jefferies’ top ideas for the consumer sector in 2024. The retail space is sure to see more than its fair share of challenges for 2024. You’ll get a nice mix of income and capital appreciation from holding these businesses.
